system.requirements:
Tier 3; Fellowship 40, Willpower 40
Aptitudes: Fellowship, Leadership
system.effect: When targeting friendly NPCs with skills that have either Social or Leadership Aptitudes (such as Charm, Command, and Intimidate), they can affect a number of targets up to 100x their Fellowship Bonus rather than 10x
